column4: hey guys, is there an IM program in ubuntu that allows you to add multiple contacts?
i have a ctt file from my msn on my other computer that i need imported
Pidgin? C:) ...
i own pidgin i cant import multiple contacts i jsut checked
Hmm, I use Pidgin for everything, I'm pretty sure it can import multiple contacts but I rarely have to import any... oh well. :/
You checked #pidgin?
@game4jc can u show me a tutorial on how to ?
I'll check...
i'll join now and check @gaming4jc
can you show me a tutorial of empathy importating multiple contacts?
Hmm I'm not entirely sure lol :s
no, i have an old msn account that has 1k users i talk to , and i wanna import that form my msn on my mwindows computer into my pidgin on my ubuntu desktop
If you enter your username and password it should import them automatically? ...
i saved all the contacts in contactlist.ctt
zer0rez: System >> Administration >> disk utility. Observer S.M.A.R.T. Data, You may also want to check out Ultimate Boot CD for "Diagnostic" Tools on HDDs. :)

lemme explain, i' am trying to transfer all of my msn contacts to a new msn with 500+ users, i want to import 1k users from my windows laptop called contactlist.ctt to my pidgin that has 500+ contacts
the old msn i' am getting rid of
Create the new account on a windows PC, import it there, then use pidigin? The contacts will remain on the server.
this is the tutorial i followed to transfer the ctt file > http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=By-ioSRNNI8
@gaming4jc my windows comp has no internet atm
All else fails there's always WINE (http://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=application&iId=127) or perhaps aMSN can do this. :)
